trans-unit.source: If you set the property to an empty string, the top of the content will be navigated to by default.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade como uma cadeia vazia, será direcionada para a parte superior do conteúdo por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the fragment navigation has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a navegação de fragmento foi processada.

trans-unit.source: If Handled is set to `false`, the system attempts to find an element with the name of the fragment and bring it into view.
trans-unit.target: Se Handled estiver definido como `false`, o sistema tenta localizar um elemento com o nome do fragmento e colocá-la numa vista.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the **FragmentNavigation** event and use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs> to implement a custom content fragment handling implementation, you need to set Handled is set to `true` to override the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o **FragmentNavigation** eventos e utilize <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs>para implementar um fragmento de conteúdo personalizado, processamento de implementação, tem de definir Handled está definido como `true` para substituir o comportamento predefinido.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigation has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o painel de navegação tem sido processada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The navigator that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O navegador que originou o <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that refers to the navigator ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>.) that is navigating to the content fragment.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object>que refere-se ao navegador ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>.) que está a navegar para o fragmento de conteúdo.</xref:System.Object>
